function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Returning residents and visitors from risk areas can potentially carry infections to their home location or new destination, increasing the risk of disease spread.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Movement of individuals between urban and rural areas","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to identify and analyze movements of travellers and migrants","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Construction of a weighted network of movements between phone catchment areas","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Anonymized records of call and text message data were provided, but still contain potential identifying information.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Large volume of communications data from a significant portion of the adult population of namibia was collected.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Biases in the age distribution of mobile phone owners may affect the accuracy of the study’s findings and general estimates of human mobility.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Modeling risk of cases occurring in specific grid cells","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Using mobile phone call data records to analyze population movement","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of travel history information from patients","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of covariate data from populated areas with confirmed cases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exclusion of locations with few cases from mapping analysis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"De-identified data on malaria cases","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of geolocated data for mapping malaria risk","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transmission season data collection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integration of movement data with case-based risk maps for namibia creates a dynamic framework for understanding connectivity between malaria risk areas.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Achieving malaria elimination in namibia by 2020 requires a clearly defined strategy to deploy resources effectively.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Targeting aggressive attack measures to source communities and implementing sustainable measures in sink regions is essential for reducing malaria transmission in namibia.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Asymptomatic infections leading to undetected transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate understanding of human movement patterns","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mismatch of measures and locations for disease elimination","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient targeted operations for identifying and managing asymptomatic and symptomatic infections","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate and untimely creation of risk maps for elimination programmes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of capacity to rapidly provide diagnostically confirmed malaria incidence in very low transmission environments","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in credit guarantee ratio during the emergency stage of covid-19","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Establishment of regional credit guarantee scheme in asean","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consideration of social risk in policy development","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Varying credit guarantee ratios for different countries and banks","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased credit guarantee ratios in asean member states due to covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty in accessing finance for smes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High loan default risk ratio npl/l","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of npl/l increase in the ’emergency stage’ due to unpredictable negative shock to gdp","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Differential behavior of banks in the ’new normal’ stage in response to gdp reduction","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Magnitude of bank responses in the ’exit stage’","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unanticipated shock to macroeconomic variables leading to negative or positive responses for npl/l","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on gdp growth affecting npl/l of banks in asean countries","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Transition through different stages of the pandemic affecting gdp and in turn npl/l of banks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Accumulated response of npl/l to variable shocks in singapore banks","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of unpredictable shock to gdp on npl/l in philippines banks","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Response of npl/l to shocks in malaysia banks","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of var approach without considering contagious diseases impact","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unanticipated exogenous shock in the model","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact of macroeconomic variables on npl/l without considering health-related factors","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Non-stationarity of the series, as indicated by the kpss test.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of long-run linkages between macroeconomic variables and bank profile components.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High npl/l ratios in asean countries","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inconsistent credit guarantee ratios for banks","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliability of econometric equations","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close proximity of people during data analysis and discussion.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of shared resources and facilities for conducting analysis.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
